meanings.definition: To surpass in reckoning or calculation.
meanings.sent1: She always outreckons her friends in math competitions.
meanings.sent2: The student outreckoned the teacher in solving the complex equation.
meanings.sent3: The calculator was outreckoning everyone in the room, making them feel inadequate.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was outreckoning any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The champion outreckoned all opponents with her strategic moves.

meanings.definition: To exceed in estimation or judgment.
meanings.sent1: His kindness outreckons his flaws in the eyes of others.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the sunset outreckons any painting I have seen.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's cuteness outreckons its tiny size, making it seem larger than life.
meanings.sent4: Her generosity outreckons any material possessions she may lack.
meanings.sent5: The impact of his words outreckons the volume of his voice.
